Class Tools

  • java.lang.Object
    • de.dfki.oms.webapp.Tools

  • public class Tools
extends java.lang.Object
    Helpful methods to retrieve often needed information or perform frequent tasks.

      • getUrlParameters

        public static java.util.Map<java.lang.String,java.util.List<java.lang.String>> getUrlParameters(java.lang.String url)
        Retrieves parameters from an URL. Parameters are key-value-pairs in the form "[key]=[value]" which follow an "?" and are divided by "&"s.
        Parameters:
        url - The URL to scan for parameters.
        Returns:
        A Map<String, List<String>> with the found keys and values.

      • getUrlEditParameters

        public static java.util.Map<java.lang.String,java.lang.String> getUrlEditParameters(java.lang.String url)
        Retrieves parameters from an URL. Parameters are key-value-pairs in the form "[key]=[value]" which follow an "?" and are divided by "&"s.
        Parameters:
        url - The URL to scan for parameters.
        Returns:
        A Map<String, String> with the found keys and values.

      • getActionEntityPath

        public static java.util.Map<java.lang.String,java.lang.String> getActionEntityPath(java.lang.String actionArg)
        Retrieves the path of an entity as a collection of key-value-pairs.
        Parameters:
        actionArg - The path as a String. The key-value-pairs are divided by "!"s and the keys and values themselves by "_"s.
        Returns:
        The path divided into its segments an represented as a Map<String, String> containing the pairs.

        Hash method. Use SHA-256 Haiyang Xu Oct 13 2011
        Parameters:
        strSrc - The source String to hash.
        encName - An encryption algorithm (if this is null or empty, the default SHA-256 will be used).

      • editTitleEntry

        public static void editTitleEntry(java.lang.String entryKey,
                                  java.lang.String hash,
                                  de.dfki.omm.interfaces.OMMBlock block,
                                  java.lang.String newValue,
                                  javax.servlet.http.HttpServletRequest request)
        Changes a block's title in a specified language, if it can be found.
        Parameters:
        entryKey - The language to find.
        hash - A hash of the locale and title to edit.
        block - The block whose title entry is to be changed.
        newValue - The new title for the specified language.

      • getSubjectTag

        public static de.dfki.omm.types.OMMSubjectTag getSubjectTag(de.dfki.omm.interfaces.OMMBlock block,
                                                            java.lang.String hash)
        Retrieves a subject tag from a memory block whose name and value fit a given hash value.
        Parameters:
        block - The OMMBlock in which to look for the subject tag.
        hash - Hashed name and value of the searched tag. (Use Hash(java.lang.String, java.lang.String) to hash a String.)
        Returns:
        The OMMSubjectTag if a match is found, otherwise null.

      • addSubjectEntry

        public static de.dfki.omm.types.OMMSubjectTag addSubjectEntry(de.dfki.omm.interfaces.OMMBlock block,

                                                              java.util.List<java.lang.String> valuechain,
                                                              javax.servlet.http.HttpServletRequest request)
        Adds an entry to a block's subject list.
        Parameters:
        block - The OMMBlock to which to add.
        type - The subject tag type (as described in OMMSubjectTagType).
        valuechain - All values as a List<String>.
        request - A HttpServletRequest to retrieve the changing entity.
        Returns:
        The added OMMSubjectTag, or null if it could not be created.

      • editSubjectEntry

        public static de.dfki.omm.types.OMMSubjectTag editSubjectEntry(javax.servlet.http.HttpServletRequest request,
                                                               de.dfki.omm.interfaces.OMMBlock block,
                                                               java.lang.String type,
                                                               java.util.List<java.lang.String> valuechain,
                                                               java.lang.String hash)
        Changes an existing subject entry in a block.
        Parameters:
        request - A HttpServletRequest to retrieve the changing entity.
        block - The OMMBlock to edit.
        type - New type of the tag to edit.
        valuechain - New values of the tag to edit.
        hash - Hashed name and value of the tag to edit. (Use Hash(java.lang.String, java.lang.String) to hash a String.)
        Returns:
        The edited OMMSubjectTag, or null if it could not be found or changed.

                                                            java.lang.String newValue,
                                                            javax.servlet.http.HttpServletRequest request)

        hash - Hashed name and value of the tag to edit. (Use Hash(java.lang.String, java.lang.String) to hash a String.)

        newValue - New description.
        request - A HttpServletRequest to retrieve the changing entity.
        Returns:

      • editStructureInfoBlockPayloadEntry

        public static java.lang.Object editStructureInfoBlockPayloadEntry(de.dfki.omm.interfaces.OMMBlock block,
                                                                  java.lang.String startDate,
                                                                  java.lang.String endDate,
                                                                  java.lang.String relation,
                                                                  java.lang.String target,
                                                                  java.lang.String hash)
                                                           throws java.net.MalformedURLException
        Changes a structure block's payload.
        Parameters:
        block - The OMMBlock to edit.
        startDate - New start date.
        endDate - New end date.
        relation - New relation type (see OMMStructureRelation).
        target - New relation target.
        hash - Hashed relation type and relation target of the payload to edit. (Use Hash(java.lang.String, java.lang.String) to hash a String.)
        Returns:
        New OMMStructureInfo, or null if it could not be created.
        Throws:
        java.net.MalformedURLException

                                            javax.servlet.http.HttpServletRequest request)

        Parameters:

        entryKey - Key for entries that have keys (for example title or subject).

        block - The OMMBlock to edit.

        omm - The OMM from which to remove the header.

      • getEntity

        public static de.dfki.omm.types.OMMEntity getEntity(javax.servlet.http.HttpServletRequest request)
        Parses an OMM usable entity from a request.
        Parameters:
        request - A HttpServletRequest from which to retrieve the entity.
        Returns:
        The parsed OMMEntity.

      • editOMMHeaderEntry

        public static void editOMMHeaderEntry(java.lang.String[] editPath,
                                      java.util.Map query,
                                      boolean odd,
                                      de.dfki.omm.interfaces.OMM omm,
                                      javax.servlet.http.HttpServletRequest request,
                                      javax.servlet.http.HttpServletResponse response)
        Changes an object memory's header.
        Parameters:
        editPath - Entry and type of the header.
        query - New value.
        odd - Table class of the response (true for "odd", else "even"). Unused.
        omm - The OMM whose header is changed.
        request - A HttpServletRequest to retrieve accepted encodings.
        response - Corresponding HttpServletResponse.

      • editOMMEntry

        public static void editOMMEntry(java.lang.String[] editPath,
                                java.util.Map query,
                                de.dfki.omm.interfaces.OMMBlock block,
                                boolean odd,
                                de.dfki.omm.interfaces.OMM omm,
                                javax.servlet.http.HttpServletRequest request,
                                javax.servlet.http.HttpServletResponse response)
        Changes an OMM entry.
        Parameters:
        editPath - Full path of the entry to change.
        query - New value.
        block - The OMMBlock to edit.
        odd - Table class of the response (true for "odd", else "even").
        omm - The OMM to edit.
        request - A HttpServletRequest to retrieve accepted encodings or a changing entity.
        response - Corresponding HttpServletResponse to fill with results if specified.

      • addOMMEntry

        public static void addOMMEntry(java.lang.String[] addPath,
                               java.util.Map query,
                               de.dfki.omm.interfaces.OMMBlock block,
                               boolean odd,
                               de.dfki.omm.interfaces.OMM omm,
                               javax.servlet.http.HttpServletRequest request,
                               javax.servlet.http.HttpServletResponse response)
        Adds an entry to an OMM or block.
        Parameters:
        addPath - Full path of the entry to add.
        query - New value.
        block - The OMMBlock to which to add.
        odd - Table class of the response (true for "odd", else "even").
        omm - The OMM to which to add.
        request - A HttpServletRequest to retrieve accepted encodings or a changing entity.
        response - Corresponding HttpServletResponse to fill with results if specified.
